content.p: Internship with TGV Cinemas is a “real” thing because we will put you into real business execution and you will be making a difference. Entertainment industries are very fast-paced, 2-months internship may expose you to multiple scale of campaigns. Via the advertisement published on TGV Cinema’s LinkedIn page. Interview session will conducted between HCM & Digital Marketing to shortlist the candidates. telephone: +6 (03) 8924 8000 fax: +6 (03) 8924 8001
